verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sanghame kristu yesuni shareeramu Andu cherina vaare angamulu{/lang-eng}
{lang-tel}సంఘమే క్రీస్తు యేసుని శరీరము అందు చేరిన వారే అంగములు{/lang-tel}
{lang-tam}சபையே கிறிஸ்து இயேசுவின் தேகமே அதில் சேர்ந்தோர் யாவரும் அவயங்களே.{/lang-tam}
{lang-hin}कलीसिया ख्रिस्त यीशु का शरीर है, उस में जुटते जो उस के वे अंग हैं{/lang-hin}

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Marmamai yunna devuni sankalapamu sanghamu dwara ihamunaku thelipenu evaru viswasinturo vaare dhanyulaguduru{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Devunike kristu Yesu moolamugaa mahima kalugunu gaaka thara tharamulu evaru mahima parathuro vaare swastya maguduru{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kristu Yesu sanghamunu kattu chundagaa prabhala levu paataala dwaaramulu evaru jayamu gaanturo vaare thanatho nunduru{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Vadhuvu sanghamukai kristhu vachchu chundagaa thaane konipovunu shuddulaina Vaarini evaru sidda padedaro vaare yeththabadedaru{/lang-eng}

verse.name: o1
